import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faWind } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faMoon } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faSun } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faWater } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faEye } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faDroplet } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faTemperatureLow } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' export default function Highlights({deg, speed, gust, sunset, sunrise, humidity, pressure, visibility, feelsLike}) { return (

Todays Highlights

Air Quality Index

Deg

{deg}

Speed

{speed}

Gust

{gust}

Sunrise & Sunset

Sunrise

{s}

Humidity

Pressure

Visibility

Feels Like

) }
